mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE HIERARCHY_MENU AS ( SELECT MENU_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , FORDER_YN , CONCAT(SORT,TITLE) AS path , 0 AS LVL FROM MENU WHERE PARENT_NO=0 UNION ALL SELECT M.MENU_NO , M.title , M.DESCRIPT , M.FORDER_YN , CONCAT(HM.PATH ,' > ',M.SORT,M.TITLE) AS PATH , HM.LVL+1 AS LVL FROM HIERARCHY_MENU HM JOIN MENU M ON HM.MENU_NO = M.PARENT_NO ) SELECT MENU_NO , TITLE , DESCRIPT , PATH , FORDER_YN , LVL FROM HIERARCHY_MENU ORDER BY PATH
